meanings: make a demand on for money

vlive.korean: 저 하나 요구해도 돼요? May I make a request? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] 세븐틴의 2020 운수대통 신년카드② (SEVENTEEN)
요구 다 들어준다, 그렇죠? I'll do everything you say. Right? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈이의 페이스 페인팅
vlive.english: I'll do everything you say. Right?

vlive.korean: [당당한 힌트 요구] 몇 집이야 몇 집? [Bold stab at a hint] Which album is it from? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “세상에 이런 김밥은 없었다①” (오마이걸 : OH MY GIRL)
vlive.english: [Bold stab at a hint] Which album is it from?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 네가 말한 게 이제 저도 몰라요구나? So what you said here is "I don't know either", right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 두밧두표 리액션 하나면 야, 너두 칸 갈 수 있어✨ (YEONJUN&BEOMGYU's reaction of their teaser)
vlive.english: So what you said here is "I don't know either", right?

vlive.korean: [흔한 2001년생의 요구] - 명대사... - 2000년대 초중반 노래로 해주실래요? [Request from a person born in 2001] - Famous quotes... - Can you give us songs from the 2000s? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [Request from a person born in 2001] - Famous quotes... - Can you give us songs from the 2000s?

examples.korean: shrill demands / protests 발음듣기 소리 높이 외치는[날카로운] 요구/항의 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
an indifference to the needs of others 발음듣기 다른 사람들의 요구에 무심함 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an indifference to the needs of others 발음

examples.korean: the requisition of ships by the government 발음듣기 정부의 선박 지원 요구[선박 징발] Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the requisition of ships by the government 발음

examples.english: He acceded to demands for his resignation. 발음

examples.korean: a lack of responsiveness to client needs 발음듣기 고객의 요구에 대한 즉각적인 대응 부족 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
